DOC.brief_summary: Eligible patients will be prescribed Desloratadine 1 tablet of 5 mg once daily. Patients will be asked to follow-up for a final visit after 14 days (Day 15) where the safety, tolerability and clinical efficacy will be measured.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Desloratadine When Used in Patients With Either Allergic Rhinitis or Chronic Idiopathic Urticaria
DOC.criteria: Outpatient men or women, age 12 years and above. Diagnosis of Allergic Rhinitis or Chronic Idiopathic Urticaria Known hypersensitivity to Desloratadine. Pregnancy or lactation
